name: Rodchenko Rampage
description:
This game was created as part of a GameArt studies at Rodchenko Artschool in 2014

Artists: Denis Makarov, Mikhail Opotsky, Misak Samokatyan, Olga Deryugina, Abram Rebrov, Ildar Yakubov, Pavel Seldimirov, Nikolay Smirnov, Sveta Isaeva, Elena Nikonole, Abramova Tasha.

Head: Mikhail Maksimov.
